mapper.sql: a.`id`, a.`organId`, a.`loginName`, a.`password`, a.`realName`, a.`customerId`, case when a.`sex`=0 then '男' when a.`sex`=1 then '女' else '' end as sex, a.`birthday`, a.`email`, a.`mobile`, a.`officeTel`, a.`homeTel`, case when a.`status`=0 then '正常' when a.`status`=1 then '限制' else '' end as `status`, case when a.`dimissionStatus`=0 then '在职' when a.`dimissionStatus`=1 then '离职' else '' end as `dimissionStatus`, date_format(a.`dimissionTime`, '%Y-%m-%d') as dimissionTime, a.`loginIp`, a.`loginTime`, date_format(a.`createTime`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, date_format(a.`updateTime`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTime
mapper.select: select , b.id as organId, b.name as organName from t_sys_user a left join t_sys_organ b on a.organId=b.id where a.id=#{id}
select id, organId, realName, loginName, MD5(MD5(CONCAT(password, lower(loginName)))) as password from t_sys_user WHERE status=0 and dimissionStatus=0 and loginName = #{loginName}

SELECT , b.name as organName, c.mobilePhone FROM t_sys_user a LEFT JOIN t_sys_organ b on a.organId=b.id LEFT JOIN t_cst_customer c ON a.customerId = c.customerId
order by a.createTime desc limit #{start}, #{pagesize}
